info.title: Schema of Azure EventHub events published to Azure Event Grid
info.description: Describes the schema of the Azure EventHub events published to Azure Event Grid. This corresponds to the Data property of an EventGridEvent.

EventHubCaptureFileCreatedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.EventHub.CaptureFileCreated event.

fileurl.description: The path to the capture file.

fileType.description: The file type of the capture file.

eventCount.description: The number of events in the file.

firstSequenceNumber.description: The smallest sequence number from the queue.

lastSequenceNumber.description: The last sequence number from the queue.

firstEnqueueTime.description: The first time from the queue.

lastEnqueueTime.description: The last time from the queue.
